misuse: CWE-757: Selection of Less-Secure Algorithm During Negotiation
description: The code uses a non-standard method to check the strength of the cipher suite, which could lead to the selection of a less secure algorithm during the SSL/TLS negotiation process.
recommendation: Use standard and recommended methods to check the strength of the cipher suite during SSL/TLS negotiation. Avoid using non-standard or custom logic for cipher suite strength evaluation.
